channel.title: Ftp on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Ftp on TLDRBins

item.title: FTP
item.description: Config Location /etc/vsftpd.conf General # Anonymous ftp ftp://anonymous:@<TARGET> # Anonymous ftp ftp://ftp:ftp@<TARGET> # Password ftp ftp://<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET> # Interactive ftp <TARGET> # Over SSL lftp <TARGET> # Fix cert error echo -n 'set ssl:verify-certificate no' >> ~/.lftp/rc # List ls # Switch to binary transfer mode bin # Download get "<FILE>" # Upload put "<FILE>" # Connect over tunnel passive # Exit quit Recusive download # Anonymous wget -r ftp://anonymous:@<TARGET> # Password wget --user <USER> --password '<PASSWORD>' -m ftp://<TARGET> Note: Always check what’s in there first
